title: City Park
description: A beautiful green space in the heart of town, perfect for strolls, picnics, and outdoor concerts.

title: History Museum
description: Explore our city's past through exhibits, artifacts, and interactive displays.

title: Riverwalk Trail
description: Scenic walking and biking path along the river, great for nature lovers and families.

title: Downtown Market
description: Vibrant local marketplace featuring food vendors, artisans, and live performances.

title: Art Gallery
description: Local artists showcase their work. Rotating exhibitions open to the public.

title: Botanical Gardens
description: Peaceful gardens with native plants, walking paths, and seasonal events.

title: Historic Theatre
description: Classic theatre with live performances, ranging from plays to concerts.

title: Science Center
description: Hands-on exhibits and educational programs for all ages.
